text: Soni tuntuluchiisye (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chitabu (Qur’an) mwakuonaonape, chachikwitichisya yaili paujo pakwe ya m’chitabu (cha Baibulo), ni kuchigosa (pakuitendela umboni yaili mwalakwemo kuti: “Ayi yakuona, nambo ayi yaunami,”) basi jilanyani chilikati chao ni yatulwisye Allah, soni ngasinkuya isako yao kuleka yakuona yaim'bichilile, waliose mwa jenumanja twapele chilamusi ni litala lyakulanguka, soni Allah angasache angantesile kuwa nkutula umpepe, nambo asachile kun'dinga pa yampele, basi pikisanani pa yambone, kwa Allah ni kwakuujila kwenu wanaose, basi nitachintagulila ichindu yamwaliji nkulekangana mu yalakweyo
